definition: low/beneath/to lower (one's head)/to let droop/to hang down/to incline
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)
to prepare herbal medicine by roasting or parching (in a pan)
to sauté/to fry/to dry by heating

sentences.english: Naturally measurements are only one part of the subwoofer evaluation.
sentences.chinese: 實事求是的說，測量參數也只是低音炮評估的一部分。

sentences.english: Each loudspeaker has a rear facing subwoofer.
sentences.chinese: 每個揚聲器有一個面朝後的低音炮。

sentences.english: Independent high and low pass filters give this amplifier the ability to run front systems or subwoofers as required.
sentences.chinese: 透過濾波器可連接前級系統或低音炮使用。

sentences.english: Also allows for direct subwoofer connection.
sentences.chinese: 還可以直接連接低音炮。

sentences.english: Hz Low Pass Filter ensures the best possible subwoofer performance.
sentences.chinese: Hz低通濾波器，確保最佳的低音炮的性能。

sentences.english: This two-in-one box reduces overall dimensions while offering a good bass level.
sentences.chinese: 該二合一低音炮尺寸適中，低音強有力。

sentences.english: The outputs allow multiple subwoofers to be connected.
sentences.chinese: 允許多個低音炮的輸出被連接。

definition: sound/acoustics/audio/hi-fi system/stereo sound system/abbr. for 組合音響|组合音响[zu3 he2 yin1 xiang3]
loudspeaker box/speaker (audio equipment)/resonating chamber of a musical instrument/sound box
hi-fi system/stereo sound system/abbr. to 音響|音响[yin1 xiang3]
to receive a radio signal/to make an audio recording/(of an auditorium etc) to have good acoustics/(vocal training, linguistics) ending (of a word or syllable)
